competencies.statement: I know exactly what I'm supposed to do in my role
my different tasks harmonise rather than conflict
I know how to look after other people's wellbeing
I have clear instructions about what I should and shouldn't do
what's expected of me is consistent and achievable
I understand how my performance is measured
I can see how my efforts make a lasting difference
I have a say in decisions that affect my role
I can manage the volume of my incoming tasks
I can organise my tasks in a way that suits me
I get to use my full range of skills and abilities
I can handle constant interaction with others without strain
I have enough time and support to complete my tasks
I can meet all my deadlines while maintaining quality
the skill requirements match my current capabilities
I do varied and interesting tasks throughout my day
each task contributes to meaningful outcomes
I can maintain focus without becoming exhausted
I'm equipped to handle challenging situations with people
I'm shielded from potentially distressing situations
I receive practical help during periods of change
I feel stable despite repeated organisational changes
my views are sought before changes are made
I maintain connections despite physical distance
I have meaningful interactions with colleagues
I feel secure in every location I visit
my task load feels balanced and reasonable
I can complete tasks without constant urgency
I can manage multiple deadlines effectively
I can control the pace of automated processes
my regular tasks include engaging activities
I experience variety in my responsibilities
my shift patterns allow proper rest
I can be flexible with my hours when needed
I can predict my upcoming schedule
my hours suit my personal commitments
my tasks form a meaningful whole
I get proper notice about urgent priorities
I feel confident about my ongoing role
my position remains stable during changes
my pay matches my contribution level
proper regulations protect my interests
communication channels keep me well informed
I maintain positive relationships at all levels
disagreements are handled respectfully
I'm safeguarded from inappropriate behaviour
my colleagues offer support when needed
everyone receives equal treatment
I feel genuinely part of the team
our team's direction aligns with my goals
leadership styles match our needs
my suggestions receive proper consideration
important information isn't withheld from me
I receive consistent guidance and support
people follow through on their commitments
policies apply equally across all levels
decisions about my role follow clear principles
authority is exercised appropriately
essential updates reach everyone promptly
I receive help with problem-solving
our objectives match my values

my contributions receive proper recognition
my achievements are promptly acknowledged
I see clear paths for advancement
I can readily access support when needed
I know all available support options
I receive thorough training for new duties
performance feedback helps me improve
my efforts receive meaningful recognition
I can communicate openly with everyone
my team shares consistent priorities
I have the resources to meet expectations
assessment criteria are uniform
my digital privacy is protected
trust characterises our relationships
interactions remain professional and courteous
I complete tasks within allocated hours

I have sufficient recovery periods

I'm protected from harmful conduct
